message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with scene change detection, which is a problem in computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper proposes a novel fully Convolutional siamese metric Network to measure changes, which involves learning discriminative metrics. This suggests that the paper may also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper incorporates the distance metric into the segmentation framework, which suggests that it may also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
